rows.business_item_short_description: We report our segment results as Google Services, Google Cloud, and Other Bets.
rows.business_item_long_description: We report our segment results as Google Services, Google Cloud, and Other Bets. Additionally, certain costs are not allocated to our segments because they represent Alphabet-level activities.

rows.business_item_long_description: We report our segment results as Google Services, Google Cloud, and Other Bets. The following table presents segment operating income (loss) (in millions), including a line for Other Bets, which is reported separately from the other segments.
